kac: But shani hta Stanford dakkasu tsi dap kaw na hpungtang hpaji ninghkring ni gaw U.S grumhpraw pyek mi nga ai hte mai mari na laika tsi hte mai shaprawt ai cells ni hpe mai garan chye ai hkamja lam jep ai jak hpe lu galaw shapraw la ma ai.
eng: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
translation: That day at Stanford University, after shortly meeting for knowledge exchange, the group wanted to go to a U.S. company and come to spread some books and even cells that they heartily thought about the event, and they did not do the work to support such matter.

kac: Ndai arai hkyep gaw sinda mawng ana hpe sut su ai mungdan ni daram n lu tsi la lu ai matsan ai mungdan hkan na machyi masha ni byin chye ai mawng ana, sinwawp ana, HIV hte hkali ana ni hpe jau jau tam mu mai wa na re ngu sawk sagawn magam galaw ai ni tsun ma ai.
eng: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
translation: This problem poses a focus on people infected with diseases like HIV and other serious problems, involving numerous people suffering from such conditions. To truly improve conditions and work extensively, they must not ignore this issue.

kac: JAS 39C Gripen mying ai pyenli gaw, buga gindai ten 0230 UTC hta hpaga pyenli daru hte grai ni ai shara pyenli gat lam kaw hkrat nna kapaw ga mat ai.
eng: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
translation: Yesterday evening, at 0230 UTC, the fighter aircraft called JAS 39C Gripen, along with many people, began practicing flight maneuvers again in the afternoon.

kac: Dai nbungli gau ai wa hpe Squadron a ning baw Dilokrit Pattavee ngu maram chye lu ai.
eng: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
translation: Dilokrit Pattavee is known as the Squadron leader in the airline industry.

kac: Buga shiga dap kaw na shapoi ai lam gaw, mahtai ginhtang taw nga ai shaloi nbungli daru wan sat madaw langai myi gaw lai wa sai re.
eng: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
translation: Yesterday evening, while playing on the road in front, there was important news that a plane crash with children on fire might happen.

kac: Asak 28 ning kaba ai Vidal gaw lai wa sai shata masum hta Sevilla kaw na Barca de shang lai wa sai re.
eng: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
translation: On April 28th, Vidal transferred from Sevilla to play at Barca.

kac: Catalan mare ninghpum de htawt sit wa ai kaw na Vidal gaw ginsup hpung a matu ginsup poi 49 hpe ginsup lai wa sai re.
eng: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
translation: Catalan is the name of a city in the state of government, where Vidal, also being a type of football club, has come to partake in football match 49.

kac: Ninghkap hpung gaw buga aten 11:00 (UTC+1) hta Whitehall lam maw ntsa Hkingmang Daju a tara shang nga shara, Downing Lam de shang na matu makawp pyada uhpung hpe man hkrum na rawt sa hpang ma ai.
eng: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
translation: The opposed group will start a march at exactly 11:00 (UTC+1) from Whitehall Road before King Charles III's announcement, intending to go along Downing Street as part of the police force's first demonstration of their protection.

kac: 11:00 hpang kaw na, Whitehall dingdung shara kaw na pat ai shara hpe myit nhkrum ai ninghkap masha ni gaw lam hpe pat da ma ai.
eng: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
translation: After 11:00, a meeting with protestors north of Whitehall led to a road closure.

kac: Aten 11:20 hta dai masha ni hpe lam makau de sit na matu tsun wa ai, dai lam pat ai nta ni hpe atsawm lajang na matu ngu shana wa ai.
eng: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
translation: At 11:20, it was said that people were standing near the road and also returned home, and they had well prepared and taken care.

kac: 11:29 ram hta, ninghkap ai hpung ni gaw Tralfalgar Square hpe lai kau nna Whitehall lam de hka kau mayan hku hkan nna Aldwych hte Kingsway manam jarawt ntsa hku lai mat nna, mungding htung hkan mayu ai hpung ni a shanhte a machyan htawngshi ta na bawngban pawng galaw nga ai shara Grand Connaught Rooms manam jarawp nga ai Holborn ginra de rawt lung lai wa ma ai.
eng: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
translation: At 11:29 in the morning, exactly the group departed from Trafalgar Square to the east along Whitehall road to meet at Aldwych and Kingsway, and from there they continued south with their friends to jointly hold an event at the Grand Connaught Rooms in the Holborn area.

kac: Nadal gaw Canadian hte man hkrum ginsup ai kaw 7-2 hte dang nna ka matsing da hkrum sai.
eng: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
translation: Nadal and the Canadian man competed and won 7-2, then achieved another memorable victory.

kac: Shi gaw ndai laman sha Raonic hpe Brisbane hpaw poi hta sha sum da ai rai nga ai.
eng: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
translation: Raonic defeated his opponent in three sets during this Brisbane match.

kac: Nadal gaw ginsup lamang 88% hta amat 76 hte shawng lu nna dang ai.
eng: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
translation: Nadal has won 88% of his matches, with a total of 76 wins and less losses.

kac: Shingjawng lamang ngut ai hpang King of Clay tsun ai, "Ndai ahkyak dik ai lamang re ai ninggang gashun ai de bai du wa ai gaw myit loi kahpra ai. Ngai du sa wa ai ndai ninggang hpe dang na matu re."
eng: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
translation: After the competition program ended, the King of Clay said, "This is a significant program for all to make efforts and eat again, entering into our minds. I, too, will eat, making it enough against all."

kac: 2016 ning machyan htawng shi ta hta "Panama Laika pa" ngu ai gaw Mossack Fonseka a Panama tara upadi kaw na wan shi hku re ai matsing ninghting laika pa ni a ga si ga ngau re.
eng: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
translation: In the year 2016, a scandal known as the 'Panama Papers' disclosed the involvement of the law firm Mossack Fonseca in Panama in substantial legal operations.

kac: Matsing laika ni gaw sut su ai ni US gumhpraw wan hkying hku re lu ai hpe makoi kau nna ahkun hkangse hte kaga rip kawp tara ni hpe koi yen na matu gumhpraw dum shi mali gaw shanhte hpe karum ya ai nga madun da ai.
eng: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
translation: Today, there is news that a business meeting in the US is set to occur in the evening, with discussions to be held on departing from the airport early in the morning. It is important to reach an agreement on the business journey being successfully arranged.

kac: British shi laika The Guardian gaw Deutsche Gumhpraw dum gaw ndai hpe awngdang da ga ai kawp sha nga ai kompani 1200 a htam masum na htam mi hpe jum tek da ai nga na shiga shapru da sai.

translation: The British newspaper The Guardian reported that the German company Deutsche Company has been ranked among the top three companies in a list of 1200, as revealed in the news.

kac: Mungkan ting n-gun madun ninghkap ai lam, ru hka amu hte seng ai tara jun ai lam hte Iceland hte Pakistan mungdan a asuya lahkawng kaw na ningbaw ni bungli hkring mat ai lam ni nga lai wa sai re.
eng: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
translation: The world's path of not showing opposition when engaging in journeys, like the waters with the heroes, and for Iceland and Pakistan government leaders, the strength to lead has not increased as it went on its path.

kac: Hong Kong kaw shangai nna, MA hpe New York dakkasu hte Harvard upadi jawng kaw sharin la nna kalang ta American kaw dingyang shanu nga na ahkang jaw lak mat(mai nga ai Card) hpe lang da ai.

translation: Born in Hong Kong and an MA from New York University and Harvard, she studied and is now a successful American woman, having received permission to use a card called 'Mai Nga Ai Card.'

kac: Mungdan ningbaw lata ai shaloi Hsieh ga jaw ai gaw Ma gaw mungdan ya ai aten pru mat wa na re ngu tsu wa ai.

translation: In the time of worldly leaders like Hsieh and others, it was then that the earth possibly began to become different.

kac: Hsieh ninghkap tsun ai gaw sumla hta tsawm ai Ma gaw arung arai hta grau kaja ai lai shingni rai nga ai.

translation: If you speak against, then in your heart it is beautiful; Ma's wealth will be more, having a bright future forever.

kac: Ndai hka jun ai lam ni nga tim, Ma gaw kanu mungdang Miwa mung a htep lahti madi shadaw tsun karum rum ai lam hte atsawm dang kau lu ai.
eng: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
translation: This is the way of the river source, which sustains; however, Ma, therefore, always explains that it's not possible to overcome the support of Miwa's countries, instead, it's possible in many ways.

kac: Dai ni na hkrak dik htum ginsup ninghkring gaw Washington mumlum na Alex Ovechkin rai nga ai.

translation: This year, Alex Ovechkin, who plays for the Washington team, broke all the best records.

kac: Shi gaw Atlanta Thrashers hpe 5-3 hte dang ai hta goal 2 lu nna shi Washington a matu 2 lang karum ya wa ai.

kac: Nicklas Backstrom hpe Ovechkin na dai shana shawng nna madi sadaw ai gaw dai jinsup ai lama hta dang wa na matu goal re.

translation: Nicklas Backstrom and Ovechkin, together, scored the goal in order to ensure victory the next time they play.

kac: dai shana na shi a goal lahkawng ngu na gaw dai num daw a shi lu bang ai 60th ngu na goal re, Jaromir Jagr hte Mario Lemieux yan dai pandung lu du ai ten, dai gaw 1995-96 kaw na goal 60 (sh) jan hkra lu du ai shang nnan na ginsup ninghkring byin wa sai.
eng: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
translation: This season, reaching a record of 60 goals makes this the only time since Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux achieved the same in the 1995-96 season that someone has scored 60 or more goals, marking a notable achievement.

kac: Batten gaw 2008 hta 190th tsang madang hta nga ai, American a lu su dik 4000 jahpan hta lawm nna ntsa lam maram da ai gaw billion $2.3 nga ai.

kac: Shi gaw Virginia Dakkasu a Shingni hte hpungtang hpaji hkawlik jawng kaw shaning 1950 hta jan mau gup la ai re nna dai hpung a alak mi re ai gam jaw ya ai wa mung rai lai wa sai re.

translation: At that time, on October 16, 1950, the wide area including Virginia's Dakota Ridge region officially became a school district, and those who were responsible for forming this organization were called a remarkable committee.

translation: During the four-day deployment of the US army, as the meetings were held from morning till evening, it completely ended because completing the meetings and thinking a large number of thoughts, they were completely lost.

kac: Piquet Jr. gaw 2008 na Singapore Grand Prix mawdaw shingjaw poi hta Fernando Alonso a matu shim ai mawdaw hpe gan sa la taw ai aten kaw sha mawdaw adawt hkrum ai.
eng: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
translation: Piquet Jr. was involved in causing a car accident at the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix so that Fernando Alonso could win the race, and this event was publicly known.

kac: Alonso de sa taw ai mawdaw gaw shimlum ai mawdaw npu kaw na tsau bang na matu sa mat ai, shi gaw awngdan na matu dai hpe tsit kau ai.
eng: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
translation: Alonso, after arriving with the luxury car, came to your place quickly. It's like people from your place even more.

kac: Shaning 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix ngut ai hpang Piquet Jr. hpe bungli shapraw kau ai.

translation: In the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix, there was an accident involving Piquet Jr.

kac: 8:46 a.m tup hta shawng nnan jet nbungli gaw mare kaba hpe azim sha lai nna yaw shada da ai shara hta hkrak tup re aten kaw bawm jahkrat mat ai.
eng: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
translation: At 8:46 a.m., an airplane was flying west toward the village and was descending to the ground. Approximately at the hour, bombs were dropped.

kac: Lamu de madun na matu wan shadaw lahkawng hpe shana tup sharawt tawn da ai.
eng: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
translation: Show the sky towards the flames, burn it twice to raise throughout the night.

kac: Myit dum shingran nam pan sun hte sa chyai ai ka-ang lapran hta lamu mada wahpang manga hpe gaw gap ding yang re nga ai.
eng: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
translation: There is a young person among us who desires to build something worthy of calling the place Nara, a city of five gardens and vegetable fields under the sky of clouds.

kac: PBS lamang hta Emmy kumhpa dazin lahkawng daram jaw ai ngut nna dai gaw Sesame lam hte Mister Rogers nta makau daram sha lagat ai re.
eng: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
translation: PBS has been known for continually receiving the Emmy awards twice. And beside 'Sesame Street,' 'Mister Rogers' also constantly obtained that.

kac: Dai lamang ni gaw laika buk kaw na madung ni hpe galaw da ai ngut nna dai madung law law ngai mawng moi ni hpe hkaja u.
eng: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
translation: This time, about the knowledge in the book, after the discussion was finished, many people were confused, so they had to study the topic again.

kac: Dai madun ai shagu hta ma ni shanhte laika sa ai shaloi gara zawn re laika ni hpe tam mai ai hpe mung madi shadaw da ai karum da na re.
eng: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
translation: On that day, in that place, when the children couldn't even read the book, I thought about how I might give them the support they need to understand it.

kac: WNED Buffalo kaw na John Grant ( laika hti ai ngoi latung a nta shara) tsun ai gaw laika hti ai ngoi latung lam gaw ma ni hpe hpa majaw laika hti ai, hpa majaw laika hti ai hpe ra ai - (lamang) gaw ma ni hpe laika bok hte laika hti wa na matu ngun jaw ya ai lamang re.
eng: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
translation: At WNED Buffalo, John Grant (as a current host of the ongoing show) and the team discussed that the show, in consideration of not just the ongoing program, will no longer continue with the current book closure.

kac: John Grant na gumhpraw ma ai hte laika hpaji myit ai lam ni a television lamang ni shai wa ai ni+F158 gaw ngut wa sai ngut kam ma ai.
eng: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
translation: John Grant does not have money but loves reading books and is different from watching television programs.

kac: Cape Verde zinlawng a sinna maga na 645 deng (1040km) ram hta nga ai, mawru gaw lamu ga shara gara hpe tim shahkri shama ai lam ndu shi yang hkoi mat na zawn re ai, nga tau hkrau tak maram ai ni tsun ai.
eng: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
translation: Cape Verde island's length is approximately 645 miles (1040 km) from north to south; the main part is the ocean with other similar islands scattered in the vicinity and more to the east and west.

kac: Fred gaw hkying hkum mi hta ya yang deng 105 (165 km/h) nbung nga ai, dai gaw sinna dingdung maga shamu taw ai.
eng: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
translation: Fred is facing winds reaching about 105 miles per hour (165 km/h), occurring at the very strong northern side.

kac: Jak shagan hte sumla gayet ai lam du wa ai aten kaw Fred gaw ya ten du hkra Atlantic a dingda maga hte sinpraw maga kaw masat shadawn lai wa ai bunghpoi laru kaba kaw n-gun ja dik htum rai nga nna sinpraw maga de na 35° W kaw masat shadawn ai kaw nambat masum kaba htum ai nbung laru rai nga ai.
eng: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
translation: We have received a message and will proceed. It is said that Fred has not come from the Atlantic Ocean's southern and eastern sides, to compare by path, then. It is more powerful than the airplane's existence or from the eastern side at 35°W and will exist. Comparing by measurement of latitude, three measurements will be known.

kac: Shaning 1759 ning shata man chyhku 24 ya hta, Arthur Guinness gaw Ireland, Dublin hta St James a Gate Brewery a matu shaning 9,000 ning shap sha ga sadi laika hta lakmat htu sai.
eng: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
translation: On March 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease and established the St James's Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland, as recorded in the documents.

kac: Shaning 250 hpang, Guinness gaw mungkan ting a bungli euro 10 billion jan (US$ 14.7 bilion) daram shaning shagu shang wa ai.
eng: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
translation: In the year 250, Guinness recorded a total global wealth amounting to 10 billion euros (equivalent to US$ 14.7 billion) annually.

kac: Jonny Reid ngu ai A1GP New Zealand uhpung a mawdaw gau garum ai wa gaw dai ni na aten hta New Zealand a tara shang asak 48 ning kaba ai Auckland Harbour mahkrai ntsa hku lawan dik ai hku gau lai nna labau ningnan galaw la lu sai re.
eng: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
translation: Jonny Reid said that the A1GP New Zealand team, with the help of the car, at this time set a new lap record at the Auckland Harbour Bridge, reaching an age exceeding 48 years.

kac: Mr Reid gaw New Zealand na A1GP mawdaw achyang hpe mahkrai sanit lang lai nna 160km/h lawan n-gun hte gau na matu galaw wa ai.
eng: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
translation: Mr Reid nearly drove his A1GP race car at a speed of 160 km/h with power over a distance of 7 laps in New Zealand.

kac: New Zealand kaw na pyada ni gaw Black Beauty ram ram nem ai majaw shanhte a lawan ai radar sinat ni hpe lang ai hta Mr Reid gade ram sa mat ai hpe mu chye na matu manghkang nga ai, Mr Reid gaw 160km/h ram shanem ai ten she pyada ni gaw nari gade na ai mai masat ai.
eng: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
translation: One day in New Zealand, although the Black Beauty car is very good and fast, it was detected by the radar system during driving, and it caused a shocking news because Mr. Reid was driving at a speed of 160 km/h, explaining what happened to the public.

kac: Lai wa sai shata 3 hta rim hkrum ai masha 80 jan ram gaw gumhpraw dam gayet ai nhkrum ai sha Central booking madi shadaw hpung kaw na shalawt ya ai lam hkrum lai wa sai re.
eng: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
translation: In the past, from three years ago, a total of 80 people were arrested for stealing money, and this has been the situation for the Central Booking, a government-supported organization. They intend to negotiate a release, as it was before.

kac: Ndai shaning shata man mali hta, Judge Glynn kaw na tara rung kaw na shana ai hpe nna ai sha galaw ai ni hpang aten 24 hta lai nna dai hpe chyahkring galaw na matu tara hpang wa ai.
eng: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
translation: This person, the child accused under Judge Glynn, has no jurisdiction case and is unable to be judged for 5 counts, and according to law 24, must release and not commit again in future.

kac: Tara madung gaw gumhpraw chyhkrat ai, sadi jaw yang, ngut nna ayang gaw dai gumhpraw hpe pyada kaw na chyhkrat ai. Dai hpang dai gumhpraw gaw mangkang ni hpe jep ai state computer system de shang ai.
eng: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
translation: That case is about money counterfeiting, which will be investigated, thus it started with money checks because it's counterfeit. Due to this, the money is included in the state computer system for government verification.

kac: Tara rung kaw madat la ai lam gaw ntsen ai wa a lawan ladan tara rung kaw jep yu na ahkaw ahkang hte seng nna masat mahtoi hpe ma matsing tawn da wa sai.
eng: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
translation: A judge in the legal court states that the way to solve legal issues must be clear, and one must obtain permission and prepare thoroughly without forgetting anything.

kac: Australia mungdan a kunhting, Petru Costello hte Liberal pati ningbaw langai re ai, awng dang dik ai masha Hkringmang daju Yawhan Howard ni gaw Australia mungdan a nuclear laknak jak rung a shingdu de shi a madi shadaw lam nla ai zawn re na galaw dan wa sai.
eng: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
translation: The treasurer of Australia, Petru Costello and the leader of the Liberal Party, named John Howard, after retiring, did not support the policy for implementing the nuclear weapon plan of Australia.

kac: Mr Costello gaw nuclear laknak atsam shapraw ai lam hpe sut masa hte dang lu na mai byin ai nga yang gaw, Australia mungdan kaw na dai hpe lu lang na matu shakut ging ai ngu tsun ai.
eng: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
translation: Mr. Costello said that the issue of nuclear weapons usage should be addressed not only in terms of risk, but also, in Australia, efforts should be made.

kac: "Lama dai gaw hpaga bungli rai yang gaw, anhte galaw gin ai. Dai sha re, nuclear n-gun hta gaw hkrang tara madung ngu ai nnga ai," ngu Slg. Kostello tsun wa ai.
eng: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.
translation: When we finished working hard on this, we didn't know. This, from nuclear weapons, had the most negative judgments, said Mr. Kostello.

kac: Ansa tsun ai hku nga yang, "Pyada ni gaw arawng aya nga ai masha nkau mi kaw na majan hpe matut manoi baw sa wa mai ai lam hpe hkrit tsang ma ai.
eng: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.
translation: Thus, I was told, "In the old days, the government also engaged in some kind of war, which caused constant struggle for certain people, and this situation was something not to be feared."

kac: Pya da ni tsun ai gaw Lo Piccolo kaw ntsa lata nga ai hpamajaw nga yang shi kaw Palermo kaw Provenzano's right-hand man nga ai ngut nna shi a mahkrum madup kaja gaw lawban dingla ni a hkung ka hpe lu ai re shanhte gaw shanhte bungli ni hpe ngun shaja ai hta provenzano's policy hpe manu ahpa hte sha lu mari ai majaw re.

kac: Brazil gaw mungkan hta Roman Kahtawlik mungdan ni kaw na kaba htum mungdan re nna mungdan kata na nawku jawng ni gaw la shada da tara shang hkungran ai lam hpe myit nhkrum ma ai.

kac: Chye ngut ai hpang dinghku nta masha grai law wa gau shapraw hkrum ai hpe ninghkap na matu tara shang karum ya na tam ai hpang, dum nta masu sha hkrum ai ni a matu Sinpraw Bay Mung shawa Upadi Zupra hta zuphpawng hpe shata man matsum 20 hta hpawng lai wa sai.

kac: Lockwood nampan sun kaw shap nga ai masha ni gaw, OHA balit ni Oakland kaw na laga shawa nta hte seng ai arung arai ni hpe jep jen ai lam galaw nna shanhte ni mung nta masu ai lam a majaw mai rim hkrum ai lam hpe sharin la ngut ai kaw nna gaw nta kaw na gau shapraw hkum na nta 40 jan nna naw nga ai ngu nna kam ma ai.

translation: Principal Lockwood, who recently opened Lockwood school, will escort OHA's assigned group from Oakland to attend a meeting with the president. This route may face some difficulties. Nevertheless, they will teach the family about that path to regularly meet every 40 days when necessary.

kac: Dai uhpung gaw masha 9,000 lamang yu mai ai Maui a Majan Masat dingsat Ginsup pa hta shangwi shapyaw lamang hpe dawn jay na ai, dai hpang shanhte n-gun jaw shawa ni hpe bai hpyi nem wa ma ai.

translation: This event has brought more than approximately 9,000 people, including the volunteers helping with the destruction caused by the wildfires in Maui, and is expected to cost around 50 billion. Despite this fact, the public has never been asked to give their strength.

kac: Dum sumpyi hpung hpe lit la hparan ai hpaga hpung HK Hparan Hpareng Inc., gaw September shata 20 ya shani shaloi lamang dawm kau ai lam hpe sang lang dan ai lam nnga ai sha hpang shani hta e htaw wa htaw sa hparan ai lam hpe lawt ga madun nna mara shagun ma ai.

kac: Greek a mying gumhkawng ai tara kasa ni re ai, Sakis Kechagioglou hte George Nikolakopoulos gaw mung masa akyang laban ai mara lu nna Korydallus a Athens hkyuk htawng hta rim da hkrum nu ai.
eng: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.
translation: Greece's two well-known lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos, imprisoned for political activities, have appealed for their release from Korydallos' prison in Athens, where they are detained.

kac: Ndai mahtai hku na gaw, Greek tara lam hte seng ai uhpung kata shatan nhkan shiga ni gaw lai wa sai shaning laman hta tara agyi ni, tara kasa ni, tara rung tara kasa ni a tara nshang ai sat lawat ni dawng pru wa ai lam grai law wa ai.

translation: At this time, in your culture connected with Greek law and society, it is said that the two times a year, usually intervals like this, the chief law and the court messenger occur in the legal sphere twice a year, with increasing importance, it is said.

kac: Lai wa sai bat ni hta, Alpha TV kaw na mying kaba ai Zoungla lamang hta shiga laika sara Makis Triantafylopoulos gaw dai lam hpe shapraw dat ai hpang, Rapdaw salang hte tara kasa, Petros Mantouvalos hpe tara nshang bungli galaw ai hte kyang laban ai kaw lam ai ngu tsun ai hpe bai dawm la kau ma ai.

However, it is still not resolved.

kac: Grau nna gaw, tara agyi daju Evangelos Kalousis gaw shi a nteng nman galaw ai lam hte mayun kumhpa sha ai lam hpe mara mu ai majaw htawng jahkrat kau ma ai.
eng: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.
translation: Evangelos Kalousis has been involved with the law for a long time, and has offered support in many ways.

kac: Roberts Flatley gaw ma shabrai ai lam hte seng ai arawn alai hpaji hte nsoi nsa gara kaw na hpang ai ngu ai lam ni hpe myit ningmu jaw na matu nhtap htuk ai nga nna, htai na matu ningdang kau ai.
eng: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.
translation: Roberts Flatley, possessing a certain leadership path, traveled to areas, developed knowledge and life sustenance, understanding how to sustain people's thinking today about collective consciousness to formulate those suitable plans, began to answer which fit the circumstances.

kac: Shi hpa mi rai tim ndai laika hpe bai kahtap tsun ai hta Roe v. Wade gaw "Lamu ga a upadi jahkrat da ai" re, galai shai lam nnga ai Mungdan Tara rung ginjaw jahkrat masat da ai ahkyak ai lam hpe ahkyak galaw da ai.
eng: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.
translation: It is said that if you look from this law, in Roe v. Wade, it was "the right to take away a woman's rights," and this brought about a change in which the United States Supreme Court has the authority to make decisions and take action.

kac: Shi mung shagrin da ai dai gaw gawai lang ai kaw na Roe a daw dan da ai hta mahta da ai laksan hku nga ai lam hpe shi kam da ai.

translation: This country's citizens, who are said to have jobs, come to the Roe region, and are involved in special paths, this time.

kac: Marochydore gaw dai lakang a lahta maga hpe shagut sai, Noosa a lahkawng lang hta hkru shara ngut sai.

translation: Maroochydore is located at the end of the road, and Noosa is situated on the north side.

translation: The 11th Women's World Cup semi-final match was organized and occurred together.

kac: Maroochydore ngut ai hpang shaman ai lam hpang chyhtum hta Caboolture hte htawng na re.

kac: Chyaloi nhkoi prat na dusat amyu langai rai nga ai Hesperonychus elizabethae gaw Dromaeosauridae amyu ni hte jinghku nta masha ni rai nna, Velociraptor amyu ni hte gaw hpu nau ni rai ma ai.
eng: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .
translation: Recently, a new kind of fossil animal named Hesperonychus elizabethae was discovered, which belongs to the Dromaeosauridae family and is one of the smallest known living animals, but it is not considered the smallest among Velociraptor kind.

kac: Velociraptor zawn lamyin tu ai lagaw lahkawng hte lam chye hkawm ai dut sat gaw mun hpring hkra re matse labye u amyu hpan ngu kam ma ai.
eng: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.
translation: The Velociraptor, with its sharp claws like knives, can run fast on two legs and is known to kill with speed. It is said to be a clever predator with a whole body built for hunting.

kac: Shi a laga lamin gaw grai kaba ai, sinna lamin ngu lachyum rawng ai Hesperonychus hte galu gaba wa ai.
eng: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."
translation: Another time, the path was very big, but actually, the path was small like Hesperonychus, which is short.

kac: Hka ge ni ayai wa ai hta n ga lamu marang masa nhkrak ai a majaw sa hkye la ai ni a matu mung yak hkak nga ai.

translation: Pittman, moreover, this remarkable incident, apart from continuing to thrive until today, is being told in a significant way.

translation: Pittman school is located opposite the river, constructed with flowing water, and this place has been home to a house standing for about 15 years.

kac: Dai ni gaw Jeff Weise hte tsin yam hkrum masha jahku kaw na masum a makoi mayang hpawng hte shata man matsum 21 ya shi jawng kata sinat gap ai lam hte seng nna kaga jawng ma ni rim hkrum ai lam a shiga ni gaw nawng hkyen makau grup yin kaw chyam bra nga ai re.
eng: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.
translation: On that day, Jeff Weise, full of misfortune, shot young people at the high school, killing himself after shooting 21 times in the school; the news of the trouble again tried to grip over the school students and appeared worldwide.

eng: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
translation: One day, it is said, there was an investigation into some news by reporters from the Minneapolis Star-Tribune, reporting that a person from the Red Lake Tribal Council named Floyd Jourdain has a 16-year-old son named Louis Jourdain.

kac: Ndai kalang gaw hpa tara hka wa mi jun na lam daru magam lu ai hpung ni hpe shabrang wa hpang de hpa baw wa mi e shadut dat re nchye lu nga ai rai timung asak kaji tara jun ai lam hpe ginjaw asuya hte seng ai tara rung kaw gaw galaw hpang nga sai re.

kac: Lodin tsun ai gaw pya da ni gaw dai ningbaw lata ai hta gumhpraw ma na hte simlum ai lam hta nhkra hkra Afghans kaw galaw ai ni hpe matut ngalaw sai da.
eng: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.
translation: Lodin said that in five days from now, it will be time for the leader to take over in Kabul, and with alertness, they should safely land in Afghanistan, for which they must continually prepare.

kac: Sumtsan kasa ni gaw Afghan a gawda tara hpe ra mung nra ai hte maren, matut shagrin daw dan sa wa ai lam hta dan leng lam law law mung nnga ai hpe mu mada ma ai nga tsun ma ai.
eng: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.
translation: Under Afghanistan's guidance, a decrease in messengers is seen from both inside and outside, and the continuous conflicts create a way full of tension, which is why care is necessary.

kac: Kahtap shingjawng na jahkring sai nga tsun da ai ndai htai lai ai lam ni hpe tau na tsun shapraw ai gaw mungdan gawda tara hte nhtan shai mai nga ai.
eng: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
translation: Nowadays, it is said that if one develops wisdom to the extent that it can be shared and published internationally, one can govern the world and bring about good changes.

kac: Dai nbungli hpe Irkutsk de yawng dat nna kata kaw na uhpung ni gaw hkau taw ai.

kac: San jep ai lam langai hpe jep san sagawn na matu shagrin da sai.
eng: An inquiry was established to investigate.
translation: San takes care of the path alone for San's investigation in order to ensure safety.

kac: II-76 gaw shaning 1970 hkan na Russian hte Soviet hpyen dap lahkawng yan a madung dawshan langai re nna lai wa sai shata mi hta Russia kaw manu mana hkala nba kalang mi byin hkrum ga sai re.
eng: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.
translation: In section II-76, it says that in the year 1970, after the Russian and Soviet war ended two years later, the Cold War has been concluded, and it has been said that Russia became a new independent region.

kac: October shata 7 ya shani hta pyenli pyen lung ai shaloi jak kaga ga byin mat ai raitim, ningma kap ai lam gaw n nga ai. Russia masha ni hku nna ndai shoihpa byin ngut ai hte II-76s nbungli lang ai lam hpe jahkring mi hkring da ma ai.
eng: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
translation: On October 7, it was believed that a Russian military cargo plane crashed early in the dawn, but the route where it set fire is not known. It was confirmed that one Russian aircraft, the pilot carrying this II-76 plane, took off, and this was also reported.

kac: Trans-Alaska hka lawng ladat a deng 800 ram hpe gaw Alaska a dingdung Fairbanks kaw na sau wahtawng hkying hku hkaw mat ai majaw pat hkum da hkrum ai re.
eng: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
translation: The Trans-Alaska pipeline, with a length of about 800 miles, runs from northern Alaska at Fairbanks to the southern city of Valdez, and hence is considered one of the largest pipeline systems.

kac: Lam manga system jep ai hta wan ngun hkrak nna matsut ai hpaw mat ai ngut nna makaw na Fort Greely seng 9 hta tsau ni yawng pru wa ai.
eng: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.
translation: On road five, after the fire power was cut off and checked against, the reinforcement was completed at Fort Greely location nine, carrying out for nine days.
